Title: Drifting Clouds
Actors: Kati Outinen, Kari Väänänen, Elina Salo, Sakari Kuosmanen
Plot: Tram driver Lauri loses his job. Shortly later, the restaurant where his wife Ilona works as a head waitress is closed. Too proud to receive money from the social welfare system, they strive to find new jobs. But they are completely unlucky and clumsy, one disaster is followed by the next.
